#summary setLED Reference.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= setLED Reference =

Controls a LED.

{{{
void setLED(byte color, byte pos);
}}}

|| Argument || Detail || Default ||
|| color || The color of the LED. Can be set to _TM1638_COLOR_RED_ (for red), _TM1638_COLOR_GREEN_ (for green) or both. || _required_ ||
|| pos || (starting at 0, left to right) || _required_ ||

= Example =

Sets the leftmost LED to green:
{{{
module1.setLED(TM1638_COLOR_GREEN, 0);
}}}


Sets the leftmost LED to green *and* red:
{{{
module1.setLED(TM1638_COLOR_GREEN + TM1638_COLOR_RED, 0);
}}}
